alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Orange; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 4:02PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow will impact portions of Interstate 89 corridor including Waterbury, Montpelier and Northfield through 500 PM EST... At 359 PM EST, heavy snow with brief, near whiteout conditions was observed on a webcam in Montpelier. The snow band is estimated to be moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds 25 mph or greater, and visibility less than a half mile. SOURCE...Webcams. IMPACT...Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Slow down. Locations impacted include... Barre, Montpelier, Barre Town, Plainfield, Northfield Village, Orange, Washington, Duxbury, Waterbury Village, Moretown, Websterville, East Montpelier, Barre City, Waterbury, Berlin, Williamstown, E F Knapp State Airport, Middlesex, Northfield and Chelsea. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 42 and 68.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
